scripts.publish: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.publish:force: git push origin $(git subtree split --prefix dist main):gh-pages --force
scripts.deploy2: npm run build && git push origin $(git subtree split --prefix dist main):gh-pages --force
scripts.deploy: echo ðŸš€ Iniciando deploy... && npm run build && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && echo âœ… Deploy concluÃ­do com sucesso!
scripts.ciro: npm run build && git subtree split --prefix dist main -b publish-tmp && git push -f origin publish-tmp:gh-pages && git branch -D publish-tmp
